Package ohos.agp.animation

Class AnimatorProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.animation.Animator
      • ohos.agp.animation.AnimatorProperty

  • public class AnimatorProperty
extends Animator
    Creates a property animator that implements the property animation of a Component.
    Since:
    1

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class ohos.agp.animation.Animator

        Animator.CurveType, Animator.LoopedListener, Animator.StateChangedListener, Animator.TimelineCurve

      Sets the start vertical scale for this animator.

      Sets a timeline curve for this AnimatorProperty object to reflect the changes of component properties.

      Sets the interpolator used by an animator, which is a linear interpolator by default.

    • Method Detail

      • setTarget

        public AnimatorProperty setTarget​(Component component)
        Sets the target Component of the property animator.
        Parameters:
        component - Specifies the Component to implement the property animator.
        Returns:
        Returns the current property animator for continuous property settings.

      • getTarget

        public Component getTarget​()
        Obtains the target Component of the current property animator.
        Returns:
        Returns the target Component of the current property animator.

      • setDuration

        public AnimatorProperty setDuration​(long duration)
        Sets the duration of an animator.
        Parameters:
        duration - Specifies the duration of an animator. The value must be greater than or equal to 0, in unit of milliseconds.
        Returns:
        Returns the current property animator for continuous property settings.

      • setDelay

        public AnimatorProperty setDelay​(long startDelay)
        Sets the startup delay of an animator.
        Parameters:
        startDelay - Specifies the startup delay of an animator. The value must be greater than or equal to 0, in unit of milliseconds.
        Returns:
        Returns the current property animator for continuous property settings.

      • setCurveType

        public AnimatorProperty setCurveType​(int curveType)
        Sets the interpolator used by an animator, which is a linear interpolator by default.
        Parameters:
        curveType - Specifies the curve type.
        Returns:
        Returns the current property animator for continuous property settings.
        See Also:
        Animator.CurveType

      • reset

        public void reset​()
        Stops an animator and resets the target Component to the initial state.

      • setLoopedCount

        public AnimatorProperty setLoopedCount​(int loopedCount)
        Sets the repetition times of an animator.
        Parameters:
        loopedCount - Specifies the repetition times of an animator. The value must be greater than or equal to 0, or INFINITE. If the value is 0, the animator will be played only once.
        Returns:
        Returns the current property animator for continuous property settings.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Animator.INFINITE

      • setLoopedListener

        public AnimatorProperty setLoopedListener​(Animator.LoopedListener listener)
        Sets the repeat listener for animators.
        Parameters:
        listener - Specifies the repeat listener for animators. You can set it to null to clear the existing listener.
        Returns:
        Returns the current property animator for continuous property settings.
        Since:
        3

      • setStateChangedListener

        public AnimatorProperty setStateChangedListener​(Animator.StateChangedListener listener)
        Sets a listener for animator state changes (pause or resumption).
        Parameters:
        listener - Indicates the listener to set. If it is set to null, existing listeners will be cleared.
        Returns:
        Returns the current animator, whose properties can continue to be set.
        Since:
        3

      • setCurve

        public void setCurve​(Animator.TimelineCurve curve)
        Sets a timeline curve for this AnimatorProperty object to reflect the changes of component properties.
        Parameters:
        curve - Indicates the curve to set.
        Since:
        5
        See Also:
        Animator.TimelineCurve

      • moveFromX

        public AnimatorProperty moveFromX​(float value)
        Sets the start point of an animator in horizontal movement. The default value is the position of the Component in the layout.
        Parameters:
        value - Specifies the start point of an animator in horizontal movement, which is a relative position in a layout.
        Returns:
        Returns the current property animator for continuous property settings.

      • moveToX

        public AnimatorProperty moveToX​(float value)
        Sets the destination of an animator in horizontal movement. If both moveToX and moveByX are set, the latter will take effect.
        Parameters:
        value - Specifies the destination of an animator in horizontal movement, which is a relative position in a layout.
        Returns:
        Returns the current property animator for continuous property settings.

      • moveByX

        public AnimatorProperty moveByX​(float deltaValue)
        Sets the relative distance of horizontal movement for an animator. If both moveToX and moveByX are set, the latter will take effect.
        Parameters:
        deltaValue - Specifies the relative distance of horizontal movement for an animator.
        Returns:
        Returns the current property animator for continuous property settings.

      • moveFromY

        public AnimatorProperty moveFromY​(float value)
        Sets the start point of an animator in vertical movement. The default value is the position of the Component in the layout.
        Parameters:
        value - Specifies the start point of an animator in vertical movement, which is a relative position in a layout.
        Returns:
        Returns the current property animator for continuous property settings.

      • moveToY

        public AnimatorProperty moveToY​(float value)
        Sets the destination of an animator in vertical movement. If both moveToY and moveByY are set, the latter will take effect.
        Parameters:
        value - Specifies the destination of an animator in vertical movement, which is a relative position in a layout.
        Returns:
        Returns the current property animator for continuous property settings.

      • moveByY

        public AnimatorProperty moveByY​(float deltaValue)
        Sets the relative distance of vertical movement for an animator. If both moveToY and moveByY are set, the latter will take effect.
        Parameters:
        deltaValue - Specifies the relative distance of vertical movement for an animator.
        Returns:
        Returns the current property animator for continuous property settings.

      • alpha

        public AnimatorProperty alpha​(float alpha)
        Sets the target transparent gradient of an animator.
        Parameters:
        alpha - Specifies the target transparent gradient for an animator. The animator is transparent if the value is 0; the animator is not transparent if the value is 1.
        Returns:
        Returns the current property animator for continuous property settings.
        See Also:
        Component.setAlpha(float)

      • alphaFrom

        public AnimatorProperty alphaFrom​(float alpha)
        Sets the start alpha value for this animator.
        Parameters:
        alpha - Indicates the start alpha value to set. The value 0 indicates that the animator is transparent, and 1 indicates the opposite.
        Returns:
        Returns the current animator, whose properties can continue to be set.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Component.setScaleX(float)

      • scaleX

        public AnimatorProperty scaleX​(float scale)
        Sets the horizontal scaling ratio of an animator.
        Parameters:
        scale - Specifies the horizontal scaling ratio of an animator.
        Returns:
        Returns the current property animator for continuous property settings.
        See Also:
        Component.setScaleX(float)

      • scaleXFrom

        public AnimatorProperty scaleXFrom​(float scale)
        Sets the start horizontal scale for this animator.
        Parameters:
        scale - Indicates the start horizontal scale to set.
        Returns:
        Returns the current animator, whose properties can continue to be set.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        Component.setScaleX(float)

      • scaleXBy

        public AnimatorProperty scaleXBy​(float deltaScale)
        Sets the variation for the horizontal scaling ratio of an animator. If both scaleX and scaleXBy are set, the latter will take effect.
        Parameters:
        deltaScale - Specifies the variation for the horizontal scaling ratio of an animator.
        Returns:
        Returns the current property animator for continuous property settings.
        See Also:
        Component.setScaleX(float)
